full_summary:
=================
### Printer for the Department of Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada

#### Notice Details
| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4352769179 |
| Amendment Number | 6 |
| Publication Date | 2024-02-27 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-04-19T14:00:00 (Expired) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-03-31 |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price |
| Trade Agreements | Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| Delivery Region | National Capital Region (NCR) |

#### Proposer Information
* To obtain the tender notice, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18918556?extsite=MTg5MTg1NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18918556?extsite=MTg5MTg1NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contact: Jeremy Racine (il-lui / he-him), jeremy.racine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Contract Details
* Department of Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) is seeking a Printer for their organization.
* The successful bidder will need to provide  documents detailing the technical specifications of their proposed printer, including pricing information.
* The contract start date is expected to be 2024-03-31 and no end date is specified.
* Bidders are required to meet the standards of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
